task.summary: Default task

1. New price view now gets all price data in one request, as before. 2. Simplified xpath selectors for names and prices 3. Created functions that scrape current prices for urls and updates them in database.
Used Q query to add condition to query that scraped price must be different from database price in order to update it in db

Removed Q query, because even if price is no different, last_checked_date has to be updated. Merged scraped_prices function into update_prices function as a generator. Prepared a function that returns a list of ids for prices that dropped in a way satisfying for the user.

is_price_satisfactory function now returns sorted list of tuples with price and user id. Created prepare_emails function that prepares max 1 message per user but with all desired price changes that happened.

scrape.py: created shop_xpaths dictionary to store xpath strings in order to simplify get_name_price_currency and get_price functions. Finally resolved the problem of proper place of scrape module in project structure - moved it to separate folder on the same level as apps. scrape.py is now not executing when server starts, but executes properly when run separately as script thanks to if __name__ == "__main__"
Moved shop_xpaths dictionary to __init__.py of scrape_prices package. Figured out setting django environment is only needed for testing scrape.py outside of website.
Reworked update_current_prices get_price and get_html_content to asynchronous versions with asyncio. Gained 8x performance in gathering data from the web.

Error handled situations where price or site may not be found. Created basic html template for err message and function in views that show it. Separated get_html_content function to async and normal version.
Sends email to site owner whenever user tries to add a shop not on the list. Corrected send_mails function. Moved venv inside project directory.
Documented scrape.py module. Renamed variable i to email_index for clarity purposes.
Translated all forms to polish language. Removed labels in new price and edit price form.
Done some work on the front. Translated all buttons to polish, removed unnecessary legends, unified sizes and buttons of all forms.
Recreated tracked-price table with django-tables2 to be fully sortable and paginated. Need to work on horrid pagination style, though.
Changed table template to custom one and what do you know, it corrected pagination ugliness automatically.
Modified password reset email message and subject. Changed footer to contain contact info and copyright symbol. Slightly changed header sizes for some pages.
A price that is not found during regular update will now have its name changed to inform the user that tracking it no longer has sense
Added pictures to logo, main and error. Switched colors back to light.
Added a jeans24h.pl shop. Added regex to convert shop url to display name without https://www.. Added name column to shop.

Extended base AuthenticationForm with custom with crispy forms helper. Moved some html code to CustomAuthenticationFormClass. Disabled displaying of AuthenticationForm error which caused columns to misbehave and become ugly. At last, after the third attempt!
Added eobuwie.com.pl and olx.pl. Had to modify price and url/name regex a little.
Added north.pl and apteka-melissa.pl. Had to modify shop from url regex a little.
Added feedo.pl, zooart.com.pl, aleplanszowki.pl and 123lazienka.pl.

Added new shops: 'bonito.pl', 'decathlon.pl', 'etuo.pl', 'gmoto.pl', 'gunfire.com', 'sfd.pl', 'zegarek.net'. Created a function in scrape.py that adds shops from shop_xpaths to db if they aren't already there.

Added new shops: ['aptekagemini.pl', 'brw.pl', 'congee.pl', 'dragonus.pl', 'edugaleria.pl', 'fera.pl', 'krakvet.pl', 'kucmar.pl', 'pieknowdomu.pl', 'swiatksiazki.pl', 'taniaksiazka.pl', 'wapteka.pl', 'x-kom.pl']
Added new shops: 'agdmaster.com', 'bezokularow.pl', 'diabetyk24.pl', 'manada.pl', 'wittchen.com'
Added new shops: ['3xk.pl', 'manito.pl', 'porcelana24.pl', 'telekarma.pl', 'wideshop.pl', 'zooplus.pl']
Added new shops: ['am76.pl', 'aros.pl', 'empik.com', 'gryplanszowe.pl']
Added new shops: ['cqb.pl', 'nestof.pl']

Added new shops: ['4kom.pl', 'astratex.pl', 'bestphone.pl', 'crazytime.pl', 'e-glamour.pl', 'ebay.pl', 'goodlookin.pl', 'grene.pl', 'karkosik.pl', 'notino.pl', 'outdoorzy.pl', 'podstadionem.pl', 'strefakierowcy.pl']
Styled shop buttons in CSS to look amazing with transitions and everything :)
